info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:54PM CDT until August 01 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR JASPER AND EASTERN EFFINGHAM COUNTIES... At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wheeler, or 9 miles northwest of Newton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bogota, Newton, Ste. Marie and Willow Hill. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 98 and 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
